Pick a mode for the background
The API Ninjas Recipe API provides access to over 200,000 creative recipes from all cuisines around the world. It provides a list of recipes for a given search query.

When searching for a recipe, 10 results will pop up with recipe titles and pictures. Then click on one of the results to see the recipe\'s details and instructions. If you need to go back, hit the back button.
